infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow PersonalAI to access your photos for image editing and generation
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow PersonalAI to save generated images to your photo library
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow PersonalAI to access your camera to take photos
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow PersonalAI to access your microphone for audio features
